name: woli-webgui
description: WoLi-webgui is a self-hosted web interface for managing Wake-on-LAN actions. It lets you add devices, trigger wake requests, and organize targets into a convenient dashboard for remote power control at home or in small offices.

features.title: Device Management
features.description: Store MAC addresses and device names for quick access to your network machines

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: See all registered devices in a clean interface with status indicators

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize devices into groups like servers, workstations, or media centers for easier management

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage and wake devices from smartphones or tablets via responsive web UI
